# sgj6_pee-max
## Setup
1. install Unity
2. Use Git command or SourceTree (need to install)
3. setup .gitignore
4. Setting code format

## Unity
version:2017.2.0f3  
URL:https://unity3d.com/

## SourceTree
version:2.6.3  
URL:https://ja.atlassian.com/software/sourcetree

## .gitignore
```
/[Ll]ibrary/
/[Tt]emp/
/[Oo]bj/
/[Bb]uild/
/[Bb]uilds/
/Assets/AssetStoreTools*

# Autogenerated VS/MD solution and project files
ExportedObj/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Private Addition item
*.log
*.pyc

# OS generated
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
Icon?
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta

# Unity3D Generated File On Crash Reports
sysinfo.txt

# Builds
*.apk
*.unitypackage
```
